author: timbeiko
content:
On another note, I've just published a set of potential ACD, network upgrade, and EthMagicians process improvements based on many conversations over the past year, and the recent session in Kenya: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/allcoredevs-network-upgrade-ethmagicians-process-improvements/20157

If teams could review by next ACD*E* (two weeks from now), it'd be great to discuss implementing some of these changes then ðŸ˜„

author: timbeiko
content:
Specifically, the three that feel most important to discuss on the call are: 
- ACD Proposal 1: EIP Review Requests
- NUP Proposal 1: PFI, CFI, SFI
- NUP Proposal 3.1: Client Team EIP Editors by Default

The rest can probably be handled async/elsewhere.
